title: "How did Dante use the 'Itinerarium mentis in Deum' to structure his journey to paradise and what can we learn from the dating of his journey?"
first_phrase: This text delves into Dante's paradisiacal journey, where he draws inspiration from the work of mystic theologian San Bonaventura da Bagnoregio. Dante's journey is divided into three stages of learning, leading up to the ultimate experience of Empyrean. This final stage of Dante's journey is marked by the presence of S.
